mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( username, password, nickname, gender, phone, email, avatar, role_code, status, remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{roleCode}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, gender, phone, email, avatar, role_code, status, remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM t_user WHERE username = #{username} AND is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
SELECT id, username, password, nickname, gender, phone, email, avatar, role_code, status, remark, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM t_user WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
